document_data.name: Olde Lace and Glitterswash
document_data.mainbody: '''Olde Lace and Glitterswash''' was a chain of souvenir shops in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: As of {{yearlink|1356}}, [[Sabrast Windriver]] claimed to be the owner of the Olde Lace and Glitterswash chain. These souvenir shops were spread across [[Sembia]].
